tool.name: SAGA.pj_proj4.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCRS_FILE False isArraySOURCE True isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_GRIDS $output_data_GRIDS output_data_OUT_X $output_data_OUT_X output_data_OUT_Y $output_data_OUT_Y name SAGA.pj_proj4.3 CRS_METHOD $CRS_METHOD CRS_PROJ4 '$CRS_PROJ4' CRS_FILE $CRS_FILE CRS_EPSG $CRS_EPSG CRS_EPSG_AUTH '$CRS_EPSG_AUTH' CRS_EPSG_GEOGCS '$CRS_EPSG_GEOGCS' CRS_EPSG_PROJCS '$CRS_EPSG_PROJCS' PRECISE $PRECISE SOURCE $SOURCE RESAMPLING $RESAMPLING KEEP_TYPE $KEEP_TYPE TARGET_AREA $TARGET_AREA TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.outputType_GRIDS transmissionMode_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.transmissionMode_GRIDS outputType_OUT_X $OutputSection_OUT_X.outputType_OUT_X transmissionMode_OUT_X $OutputSection_OUT_X.transmissionMode_OUT_X outputType_OUT_Y $OutputSection_OUT_Y.outputType_OUT_Y transmissionMode_OUT_Y $OutputSection_OUT_Y.transmissionMode_OUT_Y

param.name: CRS_FILE
param.label: Well Known Text File
param.help: Well Known Text File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: PRECISE
param.label: Precise Datum Conversion
param.help: avoids precision problems when source and target crs use different geodedtic datums.

param.name: SOURCE
param.label: Source
param.help: Source The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TARGET_AREA
param.label: Use Target Area Polygon
param.help: Restricts targeted grid cells to area of the projected bounding rectangle. Useful with certain projections for global data.

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRIDS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_X
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_Y
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Coordinate transformation for grids.<br/>Projection routines make use of the Proj.4 Cartographic Projections library.<br/>Proj.4 was originally developed by Gerald Evenden and later continued by the United States Department of the Interior, Geological Survey (USGS).<br/>Proj.4 Version is Rel. 5.2.0, September 15th, 2018<br/><a target="_blank" href="http://trac.osgeo.org/proj/">Proj.4 Homepage</a>
